name: Daebellum (jimmygre)
description:
-Developed by Solis Luna a 2nd year production team from AIE-

An older project I've decided to reupload for my own personal portfolio.

Beautiful pixel art will have you exploring every nook and cranny as you try to take a castle back from one of your demonic brothers, should you succeed it depends on you!

Using our form system the player is able to swap between a different assortment of attacks, get used to this system as it will be the difference between success and failure.

Each form has 3 light and 3 heavy attacks available to it. Have fun trying them all out!

-Controls-

L1 - Switch form counter-clockwise

R1 - Switch form clockwise

R2 - Air dash or slide

Square - Light Attack

Triangle - Heavy Attack

Circle - Interact

Cross - Jump

Left Thumbstick - Movement
